item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

Hi! My name is Abel and I’m from Peru. Using this personal site I would like share my current research as well as some publications in congress and journals. I’m doing my PhD dregee at PUC-Rio in Brazil. The objetive of my thesis is implement a control algorithm that integrate the main sub-controls that a passenger vehicle have, for instance, ABS, ESP, TCS, etc. My research interest include multibody dynamics, control theory and parallel computing. Currently, I’m working at the Mehrk√∂rperdynamik Labor at OTH Regensburg in Germany. Here, my main task is improve a virtual test car model implemented in MATLAB.
